timeline.bodyText:
nit: Add a space after or

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            * Support number accessor methods like `ResultSet.getLong` or`ResultSet.getDouble`
          
          
            
            * Support number accessor methods like `ResultSet.getLong` or `ResultSet.getDouble`
timeline.author: ebyhr
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,58 @@
+# Release 345 (XX Nov 2020)
+
+## General Changes
+
+* Add support for `RANGE BETWEEN <value> PRECEDING AND <value> FOLLOWING` window frames. ({issue}`609`)
+* Add support for {func}`extract` with `TIMEZONE_HOUR` and `TIMEZONE_MINUTE` for `time with time zone` values. ({issue}`5668`)
+* Add SQL syntax for `GRANT` and `REVOKE` on schema. This is not yet used by any connector. ({issue}`4396`)
+* Fix incorrect handling of negative offsets for the `time with time zone` type. ({issue}`5696`)
+* Fix incorrect result when casting `time(p)` to `timestamp(p)` for precisions higher than 6. ({issue}`5736`)
+* Fix improper table alias visibility for queries that select all fields. ({issue}`5660`)
+* Fix failure when query parameter appears in a lambda expression. ({issue}`5640`)
+* Fix failure for queries containing `DISTINCT *` and fully-qualified column names in the `ORDER BY` clause. ({issue}`5647`)
+
+## Web UI Changes
+
+* Fix "Capture Snapshot" button on the Worker page. ({issue}`5759`)
+
+## JDBC Driver Changes
+
+* Support number accessor methods like `ResultSet.getLong` or`ResultSet.getDouble`

timeline.author: ebyhr
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,58 @@
+# Release 345 (XX Nov 2020)
+
+## General Changes
+
+* Add support for `RANGE BETWEEN <value> PRECEDING AND <value> FOLLOWING` window frames. ({issue}`609`)
+* Add support for {func}`extract` with `TIMEZONE_HOUR` and `TIMEZONE_MINUTE` for `time with time zone` values. ({issue}`5668`)
+* Add SQL syntax for `GRANT` and `REVOKE` on schema. This is not yet used by any connector. ({issue}`4396`)
+* Fix incorrect handling of negative offsets for the `time with time zone` type. ({issue}`5696`)
+* Fix incorrect result when casting `time(p)` to `timestamp(p)` for precisions higher than 6. ({issue}`5736`)
+* Fix improper table alias visibility for queries that select all fields. ({issue}`5660`)
+* Fix failure when query parameter appears in a lambda expression. ({issue}`5640`)
+* Fix failure for queries containing `DISTINCT *` and fully-qualified column names in the `ORDER BY` clause. ({issue}`5647`)
+
+## Web UI Changes
+
+* Fix "Capture Snapshot" button on the Worker page. ({issue}`5759`)
+
+## JDBC Driver Changes
+
+* Support number accessor methods like `ResultSet.getLong` or`ResultSet.getDouble`
+  on `decimal` values, as well as `char` or `varchar` that can be unambiguously interpreted as numbers. ({issue}`5509`)
+* Add `SSLVerification` JDBC connection parameter that allows to skip SSL verification on `SSLVerification=NONE` or to skip SSL 
+  host name verification on `SSLVerification=CA`. ({issue}`5610`)
+* Remove legacy `useSessionTimeZone` JDBC connection parameter. ({issue}`4521`)
+  
+## BigQuery Connector Changes
+
+* Fix issue when query could return invalid results, if some column references were pruned out during query optimisation. ({issue}`5618`)

timeline.bodyText:
nit: Remove a space and rename to "configuration property". I know both configuration & config property are used in the past release notes, but for consistency in a release note.

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            * Allow enabling remarks reporting via `oracle.remarks-reporting.enabled ` config property. ({issue}`5720`)
          
          
            
            * Allow enabling remarks reporting via `oracle.remarks-reporting.enabled` configuration property. ({issue}`5720`)
timeline.author: ebyhr
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,58 @@
+# Release 345 (XX Nov 2020)
+
+## General Changes
+
+* Add support for `RANGE BETWEEN <value> PRECEDING AND <value> FOLLOWING` window frames. ({issue}`609`)
+* Add support for {func}`extract` with `TIMEZONE_HOUR` and `TIMEZONE_MINUTE` for `time with time zone` values. ({issue}`5668`)
+* Add SQL syntax for `GRANT` and `REVOKE` on schema. This is not yet used by any connector. ({issue}`4396`)
+* Fix incorrect handling of negative offsets for the `time with time zone` type. ({issue}`5696`)
+* Fix incorrect result when casting `time(p)` to `timestamp(p)` for precisions higher than 6. ({issue}`5736`)
+* Fix improper table alias visibility for queries that select all fields. ({issue}`5660`)
+* Fix failure when query parameter appears in a lambda expression. ({issue}`5640`)
+* Fix failure for queries containing `DISTINCT *` and fully-qualified column names in the `ORDER BY` clause. ({issue}`5647`)
+
+## Web UI Changes
+
+* Fix "Capture Snapshot" button on the Worker page. ({issue}`5759`)
+
+## JDBC Driver Changes
+
+* Support number accessor methods like `ResultSet.getLong` or`ResultSet.getDouble`
+  on `decimal` values, as well as `char` or `varchar` that can be unambiguously interpreted as numbers. ({issue}`5509`)
+* Add `SSLVerification` JDBC connection parameter that allows to skip SSL verification on `SSLVerification=NONE` or to skip SSL 
+  host name verification on `SSLVerification=CA`. ({issue}`5610`)
+* Remove legacy `useSessionTimeZone` JDBC connection parameter. ({issue}`4521`)
+  
+## BigQuery Connector Changes
+
+* Fix issue when query could return invalid results, if some column references were pruned out during query optimisation. ({issue}`5618`)
+
+## Cassandra Connector Changes
+
+* Improve performance of `INSERT` queries with batch statement. The batch size can be configured via `cassandra.batch-size`
+  configuration property. ({issue}`5047`)
+
+## Hive Connector Changes
+
+* Support coercion between `varchar` types of different lengths. ({issue}`5484`)
+* Improve query performance by adding support for dynamic bucket pruning. ({issue}`5634`)
+* Remove deprecated `parquet.fail-on-corrupted-statistics` (previously known as `hive.parquet.fail-on-corrupted-statistics`).
+  A new configuration property, `parquet.ignore-statistics`, can be used to deal with Parquet files with incorrect metadata.  ({issue}`3077`)
+
+## Iceberg Connector Changes
+
+* Remove deprecated `parquet.fail-on-corrupted-statistics` (previously known as `hive.parquet.fail-on-corrupted-statistics`).
+  A new configuration property, `parquet.ignore-statistics`, can be used to deal with Parquet files with incorrect metadata.  ({issue}`3077`)
+    
+## Kudu Connector Changes
+
+* Improve performance of queries having only `LIMIT` clause. ({issue}`3691`)
+
+## Oracle Connector Changes
+
+* Add support for setting column comments. ({issue}`5399`)
+* Allow enabling remarks reporting via `oracle.remarks-reporting.enabled ` config property. ({issue}`5720`)

timeline.bodyText: This is about table/partition schema mismatch, but it's not obvious from the bullet's text.
timeline.author: findepi
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,60 @@
+# Release 345 (XX Nov 2020)
+
+## General Changes
+
+* Add support for `RANGE BETWEEN <value> PRECEDING AND <value> FOLLOWING` window frames. ({issue}`609`)
+* Add support for {func}`extract` with `TIMEZONE_HOUR` and `TIMEZONE_MINUTE` for `time with time zone` values. ({issue}`5668`)
+* Add SQL syntax for `GRANT` and `REVOKE` on schema. This is not yet used by any connector. ({issue}`4396`)
+* Add SQL syntax for `ALTER TABLE SET AUTHORIZATION` to change the table owner. ({issue}`5717`)
+* Fix incorrect handling of negative offsets for the `time with time zone` type. ({issue}`5696`)
+* Fix incorrect result when casting `time(p)` to `timestamp(p)` for precisions higher than 6. ({issue}`5736`)
+* Fix improper table alias visibility for queries that select all fields. ({issue}`5660`)
+* Fix failure when query parameter appears in a lambda expression. ({issue}`5640`)
+* Fix failure for queries containing `DISTINCT *` and fully-qualified column names in the `ORDER BY` clause. ({issue}`5647`)
+
+## Web UI Changes
+
+* Fix "Capture Snapshot" button on the Worker page. ({issue}`5759`)
+
+## JDBC Driver Changes
+
+* Support number accessor methods like `ResultSet.getLong` or`ResultSet.getDouble`
+  on `decimal` values, as well as `char` or `varchar` that can be unambiguously interpreted as numbers. ({issue}`5509`)
+* Add `SSLVerification` JDBC connection parameter that allows to skip SSL verification on `SSLVerification=NONE` or to skip SSL 
+  host name verification on `SSLVerification=CA`. ({issue}`5610`)
+* Remove legacy `useSessionTimeZone` JDBC connection parameter. ({issue}`4521`)
+  
+## BigQuery Connector Changes
+
+* Fix issue when query could return invalid results, if some column references were pruned out during query optimisation. ({issue}`5618`)
+
+## Cassandra Connector Changes
+
+* Improve performance of `INSERT` queries with batch statement. The batch size can be configured via `cassandra.batch-size`
+  configuration property. ({issue}`5047`)
+
+## Hive Connector Changes
+
+* Support coercion between `varchar` types of different lengths. ({issue}`5484`)

replies.bodyText:
@findepi any of the following read better?
* Support reading partitions with `varchar(x)` typed columns when the column evolves to 
`varchar(y)` type. ({issue}`5484`)

* Fix table/partition schema mismatch failure when a `varchar` typed column changes width 
during schema evolution. ({issue}`5484`)
replies.author: phd3

replies.bodyText: To me both are better than the current wording.
replies.author: findepi

replies.bodyText:
Referring to "schema evolution" implies some kind of action (which may or may not be the reason for the mismatch). How about something like this?
* Fix failure when the declared length of a `varchar(n)` column in the partition schema differs from the table schema.
replies.author: martint

+## General Changes
+
+* Add support for `RANGE BETWEEN <value> PRECEDING AND <value> FOLLOWING` window frames. ({issue}`609`)
+* Add support for {func}`extract` with `TIMEZONE_HOUR` and `TIMEZONE_MINUTE` for `time with time zone` values. ({issue}`5668`)
+* Add SQL syntax for `GRANT` and `REVOKE` on schema. This is not yet used by any connector. ({issue}`4396`)

+* Support number accessor methods like `ResultSet.getLong` or`ResultSet.getDouble`
+  on `decimal` values, as well as `char` or `varchar` that can be unambiguously interpreted as numbers. ({issue}`5509`)

+  configuration property. ({issue}`5047`)

+# Release 345 (XX Nov 2020)
+
+## General Changes
+
+* Add support for `RANGE BETWEEN <value> PRECEDING AND <value> FOLLOWING` window frames. ({issue}`609`)
+* Add support for {func}`extract` with `TIMEZONE_HOUR` and `TIMEZONE_MINUTE` for `time with time zone` values. ({issue}`5668`)
+* Add SQL syntax for `GRANT` and `REVOKE` on schema. This is not yet used by any connector. ({issue}`4396`)
+* Add SQL syntax for `ALTER TABLE SET AUTHORIZATION` to change the table owner. ({issue}`5717`)

timeline.author: ebyhr
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,88 @@
+# Release 345 (XX Nov 2020)
+
+## General Changes
+
+* Add support for `RANGE BETWEEN <value> PRECEDING AND <value> FOLLOWING` window frames. ({issue}`609`)
+* Add support for window frames based on `GROUPS`. ({issue}`5713`)
+* Add support for {func}`extract` with `TIMEZONE_HOUR` and `TIMEZONE_MINUTE` for `time with time zone` values. ({issue}`5668`)
+* Add SQL syntax for `GRANT` and `REVOKE` on schema. This is not yet used by any connector. ({issue}`4396`)
+* Add `ALTER TABLE SET AUTHORIZATION` syntax to allow to change the table owner. ({issue}`5717`)
+* Make `EXPLAIN` more readable for queries containing `timestamp` or `timestamp with time zone`  constants. ({issue}`5683`)
+* Improve performance for queries with inequality conditions. ({issue}`2674`)
+* Improve performance of queries with uncorrelated ``IN`` clauses. ({issue}`5582`)
+* Fix incorrect handling of negative offsets for the `time with time zone` type. ({issue}`5696`)
+* Fix incorrect result when casting `time(p)` to `timestamp(p)` for precisions higher than 6. ({issue}`5736`)
+* Fix incorrect query results when comparing a `timestamp` column with a `timestamp with time zone` constant. ({issue}`5685`)
+* Fix improper table alias visibility for queries that select all fields. ({issue}`5660`)
+* Fix failure when query parameter appears in a lambda expression. ({issue}`5640`)
+* Fix failure for queries containing `DISTINCT *` and fully-qualified column names in the `ORDER BY` clause. ({issue}`5647`)
+
+## Web UI Changes
+
+* Fix "Capture Snapshot" button on the Worker page. ({issue}`5759`)
+
+## JDBC Driver Changes
+
+* Support number accessor methods like `ResultSet.getLong` or `ResultSet.getDouble`
+  on `decimal` values, as well as `char` or `varchar` that can be unambiguously interpreted as numbers. ({issue}`5509`)
+* Add `SSLVerification` JDBC connection parameter that allows to skip SSL verification on `SSLVerification=NONE` or to skip SSL 
+  host name verification on `SSLVerification=CA`. ({issue}`5610`)
+* Remove legacy `useSessionTimeZone` JDBC connection parameter. ({issue}`4521`)
+* Implement `ResultSet.getRow()`. ({issue}`5769`)
+  
+## BigQuery Connector Changes
+
+* Fix issue when query could return invalid results, if some column references were pruned out during query optimization. ({issue}`5618`)
+
+## Cassandra Connector Changes
+
+* Improve performance of `INSERT` queries with batch statement. The batch size can be configured via `cassandra.batch-size`
+  configuration property. ({issue}`5047`)
+
+## Elasticsearch Connector Changes
+
+* Fix failure when index mappings do not contain a `properties` section. ({issue}`5807`)
+
+## Hive Connector Changes
+
+* Support coercion between `varchar` types of different lengths. ({issue}`5484`)
+* Add support for `ALTER TABLE SET AUTHORIZATION` SQL syntax to change the table owner. ({issue}`5717`)
+* Improve query performance by adding support for dynamic bucket pruning. ({issue}`5634`)
+* Remove deprecated `parquet.fail-on-corrupted-statistics` (previously known as `hive.parquet.fail-on-corrupted-statistics`).
+  A new configuration property, `parquet.ignore-statistics`, can be used to deal with Parquet files with incorrect metadata.  ({issue}`3077`)
+* If multiple metastore URIs are defined via `hive.metastore.uri` prefer connecting to one which was seen operational most recently. 
+  The change was done to limit query failure rate if many of defined metastores are misbehaving. ({issue}`5795`)  
+* Fix Hive view access when catalog name is other than "hive". ({issue}`5785)

timeline.author: phd3
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,88 @@
+# Release 345 (XX Nov 2020)
+
+## General Changes
+
+* Add support for `RANGE BETWEEN <value> PRECEDING AND <value> FOLLOWING` window frames. ({issue}`609`)
+* Add support for window frames based on `GROUPS`. ({issue}`5713`)
+* Add support for {func}`extract` with `TIMEZONE_HOUR` and `TIMEZONE_MINUTE` for `time with time zone` values. ({issue}`5668`)
+* Add SQL syntax for `GRANT` and `REVOKE` on schema. This is not yet used by any connector. ({issue}`4396`)
+* Add `ALTER TABLE SET AUTHORIZATION` syntax to allow to change the table owner. ({issue}`5717`)
+* Make `EXPLAIN` more readable for queries containing `timestamp` or `timestamp with time zone`  constants. ({issue}`5683`)
+* Improve performance for queries with inequality conditions. ({issue}`2674`)
+* Improve performance of queries with uncorrelated ``IN`` clauses. ({issue}`5582`)
+* Fix incorrect handling of negative offsets for the `time with time zone` type. ({issue}`5696`)
+* Fix incorrect result when casting `time(p)` to `timestamp(p)` for precisions higher than 6. ({issue}`5736`)
+* Fix incorrect query results when comparing a `timestamp` column with a `timestamp with time zone` constant. ({issue}`5685`)
+* Fix improper table alias visibility for queries that select all fields. ({issue}`5660`)
+* Fix failure when query parameter appears in a lambda expression. ({issue}`5640`)
+* Fix failure for queries containing `DISTINCT *` and fully-qualified column names in the `ORDER BY` clause. ({issue}`5647`)
+
+## Web UI Changes
+
+* Fix "Capture Snapshot" button on the Worker page. ({issue}`5759`)
+
+## JDBC Driver Changes
+
+* Support number accessor methods like `ResultSet.getLong` or `ResultSet.getDouble`
+  on `decimal` values, as well as `char` or `varchar` that can be unambiguously interpreted as numbers. ({issue}`5509`)
+* Add `SSLVerification` JDBC connection parameter that allows to skip SSL verification on `SSLVerification=NONE` or to skip SSL 
+  host name verification on `SSLVerification=CA`. ({issue}`5610`)
+* Remove legacy `useSessionTimeZone` JDBC connection parameter. ({issue}`4521`)
+* Implement `ResultSet.getRow()`. ({issue}`5769`)
+  
+## BigQuery Connector Changes
+
+* Fix issue when query could return invalid results, if some column references were pruned out during query optimization. ({issue}`5618`)
+
+## Cassandra Connector Changes
+
+* Improve performance of `INSERT` queries with batch statement. The batch size can be configured via `cassandra.batch-size`
+  configuration property. ({issue}`5047`)
+
+## Elasticsearch Connector Changes
+
+* Fix failure when index mappings do not contain a `properties` section. ({issue}`5807`)
+
+## Hive Connector Changes
+
+* Add support for `ALTER TABLE SET AUTHORIZATION` SQL syntax to change the table owner. ({issue}`5717`)
+* Improve query performance by adding support for dynamic bucket pruning. ({issue}`5634`)
+* Remove deprecated `parquet.fail-on-corrupted-statistics` (previously known as `hive.parquet.fail-on-corrupted-statistics`).
+  A new configuration property, `parquet.ignore-statistics`, can be used to deal with Parquet files with incorrect metadata.  ({issue}`3077`)
+* If multiple metastore URIs are defined via `hive.metastore.uri` prefer connecting to one which was seen operational most recently. 
+  The change was done to limit query failure rate if many of defined metastores are misbehaving. ({issue}`5795`)  
+* Fix Hive view access when catalog name is other than "hive". ({issue}`5785`)
+* Fix failure when the declared length of a `varchar(n)` column in the partition schema differs from the table schema. ({issue}`5484`)
+
+## Iceberg Connector Changes
+
+* Remove deprecated `parquet.fail-on-corrupted-statistics` (previously known as `hive.parquet.fail-on-corrupted-statistics`).
+  A new configuration property, `parquet.ignore-statistics`, can be used to deal with Parquet files with incorrect metadata.  ({issue}`3077`)
+    
+## Kudu Connector Changes
+
+* Improve performance of queries having only `LIMIT` clause. ({issue}`3691`)
+
+## MySQL Connector Changes
+
+* Improve performance for queries containing a predicate on a `varbinary` column. ({issue}`5672`)
+
+## Oracle Connector Changes
+
+* Add support for setting column comments. ({issue}`5399`)
+* Allow enabling remarks reporting via `oracle.remarks-reporting.enabled` configuration property. ({issue}`5720`)
+
+## PostgreSQL Connector Changes
+
+* Improve performance of queries comparing a `timestamp` column with a `timestamp with time zone` constants 
+  for `timestamp with time zone` precision higher than 3. ({issue}`5543`)
+
+## SPI Changes
+
+* Fix propagating of connector session properties to `ConnectorNodePartitioningProvider`. ({issue}`5690`)
+
+## Other Connector Changes
+
+* Improve performance of queries with `DISTINCT` or `LIMIT`, or with `GROUP BY` and no aggregate functions and `LIMIT`,
+  when the computation can be pushed down to the underlying database for the PostgreSQL, MySQL, Oracle, Redshift and 
+  SQL Server connectors ({issue}`5522`)

timeline.author: losipiuk
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,89 @@
+# Release 345 (XX Nov 2020)
+
+## General Changes

timeline.bodyText: @losipiuk, what's the user-visible effect? Also, this description is too low-level. Maybe something like "Fix recording of query completion event when query is aborted early".
timeline.author: martint
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,91 @@
+# Release 345 (XX Nov 2020)
+
+## General Changes
+
+* Add support for `RANGE BETWEEN <value> PRECEDING AND <value> FOLLOWING` window frames. ({issue}`609`)
+* Add support for window frames based on `GROUPS`. ({issue}`5713`)
+* Add support for {func}`extract` with `TIMEZONE_HOUR` and `TIMEZONE_MINUTE` for `time with time zone` values. ({issue}`5668`)
+* Add SQL syntax for `GRANT` and `REVOKE` on schema. This is not yet used by any connector. ({issue}`4396`)
+* Add `ALTER TABLE SET AUTHORIZATION` syntax to allow to change the table owner. ({issue}`5717`)
+* Make `EXPLAIN` more readable for queries containing `timestamp` or `timestamp with time zone`  constants. ({issue}`5683`)
+* Improve performance for queries with inequality conditions. ({issue}`2674`)
+* Improve performance of queries with uncorrelated ``IN`` clauses. ({issue}`5582`)
+* Do not write min/max statistics for `timestamp` columns. ({issue}`5858`)
+* Fix incorrect handling of negative offsets for the `time with time zone` type. ({issue}`5696`)
+* Fix incorrect result when casting `time(p)` to `timestamp(p)` for precisions higher than 6. ({issue}`5736`)
+* Fix incorrect query results when comparing a `timestamp` column with a `timestamp with time zone` constant. ({issue}`5685`)
+* Fix improper table alias visibility for queries that select all fields. ({issue}`5660`)
+* Fix failure when query parameter appears in a lambda expression. ({issue}`5640`)
+* Fix failure for queries containing `DISTINCT *` and fully-qualified column names in the `ORDER BY` clause. ({issue}`5647`)
+* Fix planning failure for certain queries involving `INNER JOIN`, `GROUP BY` and correlated subqueries. ({issue}`5846`)
+* Fix issue when `EventListener` was sometimes not called if query was aborted in initial phase of execution. ({issue}`5815`)

replies.bodyText: I think your suggestion is nice. This is user visible as events are consumed by users code (via provided EventListener implementations)
replies.author: losipiuk

timeline.author: phd3
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,91 @@
+# Release 345 (XX Nov 2020)
+
+## General Changes
+
+* Add support for `RANGE BETWEEN <value> PRECEDING AND <value> FOLLOWING` window frames. ({issue}`609`)
+* Add support for window frames based on `GROUPS`. ({issue}`5713`)
+* Add support for {func}`extract` with `TIMEZONE_HOUR` and `TIMEZONE_MINUTE` for `time with time zone` values. ({issue}`5668`)
+* Add SQL syntax for `GRANT` and `REVOKE` on schema. This is not yet used by any connector. ({issue}`4396`)
+* Add `ALTER TABLE SET AUTHORIZATION` syntax to allow to change the table owner. ({issue}`5717`)
+* Make `EXPLAIN` more readable for queries containing `timestamp` or `timestamp with time zone`  constants. ({issue}`5683`)
+* Improve performance for queries with inequality conditions. ({issue}`2674`)
+* Improve performance of queries with uncorrelated ``IN`` clauses. ({issue}`5582`)
+* Do not write min/max statistics for `timestamp` columns. ({issue}`5858`)
+* Fix incorrect handling of negative offsets for the `time with time zone` type. ({issue}`5696`)
+* Fix incorrect result when casting `time(p)` to `timestamp(p)` for precisions higher than 6. ({issue}`5736`)
+* Fix incorrect query results when comparing a `timestamp` column with a `timestamp with time zone` constant. ({issue}`5685`)
+* Fix improper table alias visibility for queries that select all fields. ({issue}`5660`)
+* Fix failure when query parameter appears in a lambda expression. ({issue}`5640`)
+* Fix failure for queries containing `DISTINCT *` and fully-qualified column names in the `ORDER BY` clause. ({issue}`5647`)
+* Fix planning failure for certain queries involving `INNER JOIN`, `GROUP BY` and correlated subqueries. ({issue}`5846`)
+* Fix issue when `EventListener` was sometimes not called if query was aborted in initial phase of execution. ({issue}`5815`)
+
+## Web UI Changes
+
+* Fix "Capture Snapshot" button on the Worker page. ({issue}`5759`)
+
+## JDBC Driver Changes
+
+* Support number accessor methods like `ResultSet.getLong` or `ResultSet.getDouble`
+  on `decimal` values, as well as `char` or `varchar` that can be unambiguously interpreted as numbers. ({issue}`5509`)
+* Add `SSLVerification` JDBC connection parameter that allows to skip SSL verification on `SSLVerification=NONE` or to skip SSL 
+  host name verification on `SSLVerification=CA`. ({issue}`5610`)
+* Remove legacy `useSessionTimeZone` JDBC connection parameter. ({issue}`4521`)
+* Implement `ResultSet.getRow()`. ({issue}`5769`)
+  
+## BigQuery Connector Changes
+
+* Fix issue when query could return invalid results, if some column references were pruned out during query optimization. ({issue}`5618`)
+
+## Cassandra Connector Changes
+
+* Improve performance of `INSERT` queries with batch statement. The batch size can be configured via `cassandra.batch-size`
+  configuration property. ({issue}`5047`)
+
+## Elasticsearch Connector Changes
+
+* Fix failure when index mappings do not contain a `properties` section. ({issue}`5807`)
+
+## Hive Connector Changes
+
+* Add support for `ALTER TABLE SET AUTHORIZATION` SQL syntax to change the table owner. ({issue}`5717`)
+* Improve query performance by adding support for dynamic bucket pruning. ({issue}`5634`)
+* Remove deprecated `parquet.fail-on-corrupted-statistics` (previously known as `hive.parquet.fail-on-corrupted-statistics`).
+  A new configuration property, `parquet.ignore-statistics`, can be used to deal with Parquet files with incorrect metadata.  ({issue}`3077`)
+* If multiple metastore URIs are defined via `hive.metastore.uri` prefer connecting to one which was seen operational most recently. 
+  The change was done to limit query failure rate if many of defined metastores are misbehaving. ({issue}`5795`)  
+* Fix Hive view access when catalog name is other than "hive". ({issue}`5785`)
+* Fix failure when the declared length of a `varchar(n)` column in the partition schema differs from the table schema. ({issue}`5484`)
+
+## Iceberg Connector Changes
+
+* Remove deprecated `parquet.fail-on-corrupted-statistics` (previously known as `hive.parquet.fail-on-corrupted-statistics`).
+  A new configuration property, `parquet.ignore-statistics`, can be used to deal with Parquet files with incorrect metadata.  ({issue}`3077`)
+    
+## Kudu Connector Changes
+
+* Improve performance of queries having only `LIMIT` clause. ({issue}`3691`)
+
+## MySQL Connector Changes
+
+* Improve performance for queries containing a predicate on a `varbinary` column. ({issue}`5672`)
+
+## Oracle Connector Changes
+
+* Add support for setting column comments. ({issue}`5399`)
+* Allow enabling remarks reporting via `oracle.remarks-reporting.enabled` configuration property. ({issue}`5720`)
+
+## PostgreSQL Connector Changes
+
+* Improve performance of queries comparing a `timestamp` column with a `timestamp with time zone` constants 
+  for `timestamp with time zone` precision higher than 3. ({issue}`5543`)
+
+## SPI Changes
+
+* Fix propagating of connector session properties to `ConnectorNodePartitioningProvider`. ({issue}`5690`)

+* Add support for `RANGE BETWEEN <value> PRECEDING AND <value> FOLLOWING` window frames. ({issue}`609`)
+* Add support for window frames based on `GROUPS`. ({issue}`5713`)
+* Add support for {func}`extract` with `TIMEZONE_HOUR` and `TIMEZONE_MINUTE` for `time with time zone` values. ({issue}`5668`)
+* Add SQL syntax for `GRANT` and `REVOKE` on schema. This is not yet used by any connector. ({issue}`4396`)
+* Add `ALTER TABLE SET AUTHORIZATION` syntax to allow to change the table owner. ({issue}`5717`)
+* Make `EXPLAIN` more readable for queries containing `timestamp` or `timestamp with time zone`  constants. ({issue}`5683`)
+* Improve performance for queries with inequality conditions. ({issue}`2674`)
+* Improve performance of queries with uncorrelated ``IN`` clauses. ({issue}`5582`)
+* Fix incorrect handling of negative offsets for the `time with time zone` type. ({issue}`5696`)
+* Fix incorrect result when casting `time(p)` to `timestamp(p)` for precisions higher than 6. ({issue}`5736`)
+* Fix incorrect query results when comparing a `timestamp` column with a `timestamp with time zone` constant. ({issue}`5685`)
+* Fix improper table alias visibility for queries that select all fields. ({issue}`5660`)
+* Fix failure when query parameter appears in a lambda expression. ({issue}`5640`)
+* Fix failure for queries containing `DISTINCT *` and fully-qualified column names in the `ORDER BY` clause. ({issue}`5647`)
+* Fix planning failure for certain queries involving `INNER JOIN`, `GROUP BY` and correlated subqueries. ({issue}`5846`)
+* Fix recording of query completion event when query is aborted early. ({issue}`5815`)
+
+## Web UI Changes
+
+* Fix "Capture Snapshot" button on the Worker page. ({issue}`5759`)
+
+## JDBC Driver Changes
+
+* Support number accessor methods like `ResultSet.getLong` or `ResultSet.getDouble`
+  on `decimal` values, as well as `char` or `varchar` that can be unambiguously interpreted as numbers. ({issue}`5509`)
+* Add `SSLVerification` JDBC connection parameter that allows to skip SSL verification on `SSLVerification=NONE` or to skip SSL 
+  host name verification on `SSLVerification=CA`. ({issue}`5610`)
+* Remove legacy `useSessionTimeZone` JDBC connection parameter. ({issue}`4521`)
+* Implement `ResultSet.getRow()`. ({issue}`5769`)
+  
+## BigQuery Connector Changes
+
+* Fix issue when query could return invalid results, if some column references were pruned out during query optimization. ({issue}`5618`)
+
+## Cassandra Connector Changes
+
+* Improve performance of `INSERT` queries with batch statement. The batch size can be configured via `cassandra.batch-size`
+  configuration property. ({issue}`5047`)
+
+## Elasticsearch Connector Changes
+
+* Fix failure when index mappings do not contain a `properties` section. ({issue}`5807`)
+
+## Hive Connector Changes
+
+* Add support for `ALTER TABLE SET AUTHORIZATION` SQL syntax to change the table owner. ({issue}`5717`)
+* Improve query performance by adding support for dynamic bucket pruning. ({issue}`5634`)
+* Remove deprecated `parquet.fail-on-corrupted-statistics` (previously known as `hive.parquet.fail-on-corrupted-statistics`).
+  A new configuration property, `parquet.ignore-statistics`, can be used to deal with Parquet files with incorrect metadata.  ({issue}`3077`)
+* Do not write min/max statistics for `timestamp` columns. ({issue}`5858`)
+* If multiple metastore URIs are defined via `hive.metastore.uri` prefer connecting to one which was seen operational most recently.

timeline.bodyText: This prevents query failures when one or more metastores are misbehaving.
timeline.author: electrum
timeline.diffHunk:

+# Release 346 (XX Nov 2020)
+
+## General Changes

+* Add support for `RANGE BETWEEN <value> PRECEDING AND <value> FOLLOWING` window frames. ({issue}`609`)
+* Add support for window frames based on `GROUPS`. ({issue}`5713`)

+* Add SQL syntax for `GRANT` and `REVOKE` on schema. This is not yet used by any connector. ({issue}`4396`)
+* Add `ALTER TABLE SET AUTHORIZATION` syntax to allow to change the table owner. ({issue}`5717`)
+* Make `EXPLAIN` more readable for queries containing `timestamp` or `timestamp with time zone`  constants. ({issue}`5683`)
+* Improve performance for queries with inequality conditions. ({issue}`2674`)
+* Improve performance of queries with uncorrelated ``IN`` clauses. ({issue}`5582`)
+* Fix incorrect handling of negative offsets for the `time with time zone` type. ({issue}`5696`)
+* Fix incorrect result when casting `time(p)` to `timestamp(p)` for precisions higher than 6. ({issue}`5736`)
+* Fix incorrect query results when comparing a `timestamp` column with a `timestamp with time zone` constant. ({issue}`5685`)
+* Fix improper table alias visibility for queries that select all fields. ({issue}`5660`)
+* Fix failure when query parameter appears in a lambda expression. ({issue}`5640`)
+* Fix failure for queries containing `DISTINCT *` and fully-qualified column names in the `ORDER BY` clause. ({issue}`5647`)
+* Fix planning failure for certain queries involving `INNER JOIN`, `GROUP BY` and correlated subqueries. ({issue}`5846`)
+* Fix recording of query completion event when query is aborted early. ({issue}`5815`)
+
+## Web UI Changes
+
+* Fix "Capture Snapshot" button on the Worker page. ({issue}`5759`)
+
+## JDBC Driver Changes
+
+* Support number accessor methods like `ResultSet.getLong` or `ResultSet.getDouble`
+  on `decimal` values, as well as `char` or `varchar` that can be unambiguously interpreted as numbers. ({issue}`5509`)
+* Add `SSLVerification` JDBC connection parameter that allows to skip SSL verification on `SSLVerification=NONE` or to skip SSL 
+  host name verification on `SSLVerification=CA`. ({issue}`5610`)
+* Remove legacy `useSessionTimeZone` JDBC connection parameter. ({issue}`4521`)
+* Implement `ResultSet.getRow()`. ({issue}`5769`)
+  
+## BigQuery Connector Changes
+
+* Fix issue when query could return invalid results, if some column references were pruned out during query optimization. ({issue}`5618`)
+
+## Cassandra Connector Changes
+
+* Improve performance of `INSERT` queries with batch statement. The batch size can be configured via `cassandra.batch-size`
+  configuration property. ({issue}`5047`)
+
+## Elasticsearch Connector Changes
+
+* Fix failure when index mappings do not contain a `properties` section. ({issue}`5807`)
+
+## Hive Connector Changes
+
+* Add support for `ALTER TABLE SET AUTHORIZATION` SQL syntax to change the table owner. ({issue}`5717`)
+* Improve query performance by adding support for dynamic bucket pruning. ({issue}`5634`)
+* Remove deprecated `parquet.fail-on-corrupted-statistics` (previously known as `hive.parquet.fail-on-corrupted-statistics`).
+  A new configuration property, `parquet.ignore-statistics`, can be used to deal with Parquet files with incorrect metadata.  ({issue}`3077`)
+* Do not write min/max statistics for `timestamp` columns. ({issue}`5858`)
+* If multiple metastore URIs are defined via `hive.metastore.uri` prefer connecting to one which was seen operational most recently. 
+  The change was done to limit query failure rate if many of defined metastores are misbehaving. ({issue}`5795`)

+  on `decimal` values, as well as `char` or `varchar` that can be unambiguously interpreted as numbers. ({issue}`5509`)
+* Add `SSLVerification` JDBC connection parameter that allows to skip SSL verification on `SSLVerification=NONE` or to skip SSL 
+  host name verification on `SSLVerification=CA`. ({issue}`5610`)

+

+  configuration property. ({issue}`5047`)

+## Hive Connector Changes
+
+* Add support for `ALTER TABLE SET AUTHORIZATION` SQL syntax to change the table owner. ({issue}`5717`)
+* Improve query performance by adding support for dynamic bucket pruning. ({issue}`5634`)

@@ -0,0 +1,93 @@
+# Release 346 (XX Nov 2020)
+
+## General Changes
+
+* Add support for `RANGE BETWEEN <value> PRECEDING AND <value> FOLLOWING` window frames. ({issue}`609`)
+* Add support for window frames based on `GROUPS`. ({issue}`5713`)
+* Add support for {func}`extract` with `TIMEZONE_HOUR` and `TIMEZONE_MINUTE` for `time with time zone` values. ({issue}`5668`)
+* Add SQL syntax for `GRANT` and `REVOKE` on schema. This is not yet used by any connector. ({issue}`4396`)
+* Add `ALTER TABLE SET AUTHORIZATION` syntax to allow to change the table owner. ({issue}`5717`)
+* Make `EXPLAIN` more readable for queries containing `timestamp` or `timestamp with time zone`  constants. ({issue}`5683`)
+* Improve performance for queries with inequality conditions. ({issue}`2674`)
+* Improve performance of queries with uncorrelated ``IN`` clauses. ({issue}`5582`)
+* Fix incorrect handling of negative offsets for the `time with time zone` type. ({issue}`5696`)
+* Fix incorrect result when casting `time(p)` to `timestamp(p)` for precisions higher than 6. ({issue}`5736`)
+* Fix incorrect query results when comparing a `timestamp` column with a `timestamp with time zone` constant. ({issue}`5685`)
+* Fix improper table alias visibility for queries that select all fields. ({issue}`5660`)
+* Fix failure when query parameter appears in a lambda expression. ({issue}`5640`)
+* Fix failure for queries containing `DISTINCT *` and fully-qualified column names in the `ORDER BY` clause. ({issue}`5647`)
+* Fix planning failure for certain queries involving `INNER JOIN`, `GROUP BY` and correlated subqueries. ({issue}`5846`)
+* Fix recording of query completion event when query is aborted early. ({issue}`5815`)
+
+## Web UI Changes
+
+* Fix "Capture Snapshot" button on the Worker page. ({issue}`5759`)
+
+## JDBC Driver Changes
+
+* Support number accessor methods like `ResultSet.getLong` or `ResultSet.getDouble`
+  on `decimal` values, as well as `char` or `varchar` that can be unambiguously interpreted as numbers. ({issue}`5509`)
+* Add `SSLVerification` JDBC connection parameter that allows to skip SSL verification on `SSLVerification=NONE` or to skip SSL 
+  host name verification on `SSLVerification=CA`. ({issue}`5610`)
+* Remove legacy `useSessionTimeZone` JDBC connection parameter. ({issue}`4521`)
+* Implement `ResultSet.getRow()`. ({issue}`5769`)
+  
+## BigQuery Connector Changes
+
+* Fix issue when query could return invalid results, if some column references were pruned out during query optimization. ({issue}`5618`)
+
+## Cassandra Connector Changes
+
+* Improve performance of `INSERT` queries with batch statement. The batch size can be configured via `cassandra.batch-size`
+  configuration property. ({issue}`5047`)
+
+## Elasticsearch Connector Changes
+
+* Fix failure when index mappings do not contain a `properties` section. ({issue}`5807`)
+
+## Hive Connector Changes
+
+* Add support for `ALTER TABLE SET AUTHORIZATION` SQL syntax to change the table owner. ({issue}`5717`)
+* Improve query performance by adding support for dynamic bucket pruning. ({issue}`5634`)
+* Remove deprecated `parquet.fail-on-corrupted-statistics` (previously known as `hive.parquet.fail-on-corrupted-statistics`).
+  A new configuration property, `parquet.ignore-statistics`, can be used to deal with Parquet files with incorrect metadata.  ({issue}`3077`)
+* Do not write min/max statistics for `timestamp` columns. ({issue}`5858`)
+* If multiple metastore URIs are defined via `hive.metastore.uri` prefer connecting to one which was seen operational most recently. 
+  The change was done to limit query failure rate if many of defined metastores are misbehaving. ({issue}`5795`)  
+* Fix Hive view access when catalog name is other than "hive". ({issue}`5785`)
+* Fix failure when the declared length of a `varchar(n)` column in the partition schema differs from the table schema. ({issue}`5484`)
+
+## Iceberg Connector Changes
+
+* Remove deprecated `parquet.fail-on-corrupted-statistics` (previously known as `hive.parquet.fail-on-corrupted-statistics`).
+  A new configuration property, `parquet.ignore-statistics`, can be used to deal with Parquet files with incorrect metadata.  ({issue}`3077`)
+    
+## Kudu Connector Changes
+
+* Improve performance of queries having only `LIMIT` clause. ({issue}`3691`)
+
+## MySQL Connector Changes
+
+* Improve performance for queries containing a predicate on a `varbinary` column. ({issue}`5672`)
+
+## Oracle Connector Changes
+
+* Add support for setting column comments. ({issue}`5399`)
+* Allow enabling remarks reporting via `oracle.remarks-reporting.enabled` configuration property. ({issue}`5720`)
+
+## PostgreSQL Connector Changes
+
+* Improve performance of queries comparing a `timestamp` column with a `timestamp with time zone` constants 
+  for `timestamp with time zone` precision higher than 3. ({issue}`5543`)
+
+## SPI Changes
